attributes.action: Why are paid up/paying National Health British citizens who have long term overseas careers denied access to NHS when on leave in UK and when visiting UK they have to pay to see a GP?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Example: Employees working in Oxfam UK- HQ have full access to the NHS whilst oxfam staff working overseas, when visiting UK do not, 

So, such people are paying into a system that they are denied; they have to pay for their health care when overseas and are expected to pay yet again when in UK?

To add insult to injury foreign students have full access to the NHS as do refugees in process.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
